structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 158, effective January 1, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 204, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1949 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 11. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 6. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4051a.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Annual reports of recorded evidences of indebtedness, by county clerk to property valuation administrators -- Compensation of clerk.
